definition: projective geometry/same as 射影幾何學|射影几何学

sentences.english: One felt that the chief of this barricade was a geometrician or a spectre.

sentences.english: The false gods arranged sacred geometry that shattered the 1 billion souls into subservience .
sentences.chinese: 虛假神們改寫了神聖幾何學去粉碎那1億個靈魂。

sentences.english: His idea was to apply geometry to dynamics.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法就是將幾何學應用在力學上。

sentences.english: Geometry is a branch of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 幾何學是數學的一個分科。

sentences.english: At is time the subject of topology was known as analysis situs .
sentences.chinese: 在這個時候，拓撲學被稱做位置幾何學。

sentences.english: The synthetic geometers were developing projective geometry .

sentences.english: Could that name also be linked to the Phi Ratio of Sacred Geometry?

sentences.english: The length of a line segment?
sentences.chinese: 好，幾何學是怎麼說的來着？

sentences.english: The problem can be thought of geometrically.
sentences.chinese: 這一問題讓人想起用幾何學加以解答。

sentences.english: He recalled what Stephanie had said about the building’s geometry.
sentences.chinese: 他回憶起絲苔妮所說的關於這房子的幾何學。

sentences.english: Prions act in the place where chemistry and geometry intersect.

sentences.english: The photographer put the graph in the paragraph on geographicing geometry.

sentences.english: His work in geometry aided in the eventual development of integral calculus.
sentences.chinese: 他對幾何學的研究促進了積分學的發展。

sentences.english: In the QTVR player, the hotspots do not have the right geometry.
sentences.chinese: 在QTVR播放器中，熱點沒有正確的幾何學。

sentences.english: Its subsidiary basin is of geometry characteristics similar to them.
sentences.chinese: 其次級盆地具有與之相似的幾何學特徵。

definition: to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
